name: Sniper Elite 3
notes:
After install switch to BETA Branch "customersupportlogging" or game might not start/crash.
Needs Wine + Faudio or native xaudio (Use winetricks to install xact)
Mouse input (like click) gets disabled sometimes, seems to more often happen with tkg-proton-wine versions, but also (less often) with normal tkg-wine versions.
content:
game:
  appid: 238090
  arch: win64
  prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
system:
  env:
    DXVK_HUD: 0
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE: 0
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE_PATH: $GAMEDIR
winesteam:
  dxvk: true
